title: Home | Hillandale Farms
text: Ultra Fast Moving Consumer Goods Egg Specialists Decades of expertise in producing and distributing high-quality eggs. Strong Regional Brands Trusted names across the U.S., tailored to each market. High Value-Added Portfolio From classic white eggs to organic, cage-free, and specialty offerings. Sustainability Renewable energy, waste recycling, and animal welfare at our core. A Legacy of Care. A Future of Innovation Honoring our roots. Leading with purpose. Founded in 1958, Hillandale Farms has grown from a humble egg distribution company into one of the leading egg producers in the United States — now proudly part of Global Eggs, the second-largest egg company in the world. Grounded in tradition and driven by responsibility, we care for over 20 million hens and deliver a high-value portfolio that meets every consumption occasion — from everyday breakfast to foodservice innovation. Our growth is powered by bold innovation and a deep commitment to sustainability: 100% vegetarian feed, renewable energy, advanced waste treatment systems, and complete vertical integration. We're not just producing eggs — we’re helping to build a smarter, more sustainable food future. At Hillandale Farms, we believe that doing exceptional work today lays the foundation for a stronger, more nourishing tomorrow — in every home, on every shelf, and on every plate in America. Our Products: At Hillandale Farms, our portfolio goes far beyond the egg. We offer a full range of shell eggs — from conventional to premium cage-free, organic, pasture-raised, Omega-3 enriched, and specialty options — designed to meet the evolving needs of modern consumers. Whether it’s a breakfast staple or a key ingredient in a culinary creation, our products deliver quality, taste, and nutritional value to every table. We’re proud to partner with hundreds of retailers across the U.S., co-developing category strategies, private label programs, and in-store activations that drive growth and deepen consumer connection. Committed to animal care at every step. Animal Welfare & Certifications Certifications At Hillandale Farms, we believe that doing the right thing starts at the source — and that means putting animal welfare first. We’ve proudly earned and maintained industry-leading certifications across all of our farming systems. These recognitions aren’t just labels — they’re our promise of transparency, care, and uncompromising quality at every level.
